HeroSection.label: Internxt's Affiliate Program
HeroSection.description: Join Internxt’s world-class affiliate program and earn money promoting zero-knowledge cloud storage to your audience. Let’s build a safer, fairer, and better internet together.

cards.title: Create an affiliate account
cards.description: Sign up to be an affiliate by following this link.

cards.title: Promote Internxt
cards.description: Create content about us using your unique tracking links. Every time someone clicks your tracking link and makes a purchase, you earn a commission!

cards.title: Get paid for every purchase!
cards.description: Earn cash for every paid user. There are no limits to the number of payouts we issue at the end of each month.

WhatIsInternxtSection.title: What is Internxt?
WhatIsInternxtSection.subtitle: Internxt Drive is a zero-knowledge cloud storage service providing best-in-class privacy and security.
WhatIsInternxtSection.description: Internxt doesn’t access or sell your data. Unlike competitors, our business model is not based on ads or the sale of user information. Built on open-source, zero-knowledge technology, Internxt is designed for the future and protects users’ right to privacy.

WhatWeDoSection.title: Internxt guarantees privacy, security, and military-grade encryption for everyone
WhatWeDoSection.description: Join Internxt in our dedication to promoting a secure and private experience for everyone. Internxt’s secure cloud storage is a tool and service built to provide everyone with privacy-focused cloud storage.

cards.title: All your files on all your devices
cards.description: Securely access all your files from any device with a connection to the internet via our web, desktop, and mobile apps.

cards.title: Keep your files organized
cards.description: Internxt lets you organize your files in folders, rename them, and filter a list of files to find what you want faster.

cards.title: Share your files with ease
cards.description: You choose who you want to share with and how many times you want your files to be downloaded.

cards.title: Back up what matters to you
cards.description: Stay current and preserve the latest version of that important file or folder you're working on.

drive.title: Earn big by promoting Internxt B2B and B2C plans
description: Join Internxt in giving businesses and individuals a platform to secure and protect against data loss with ultra-powerful encryption.
Our cloud storage for everyone offers advanced file management, security, privacy, and more, allowing industries, families, or individuals to enjoy the benefits of private cloud storage.

s3.title: Help companies manage large-scale data with Internxt object storage
description: We also offer S3-compatible object storage, an affordable cloud storage solution to manage files within a high-performance, secure infrastructure.

faq.question: What type of partners does Internxt work with?
answer: We work with everyone who produces content: bloggers, websites, influencers, YouTubers, LinkedIn pros, etc.

faq.question: How soon can I receive my first payout?
answer: We issue payouts automatically at the end of the month.

faq.question: What is the best way to promote Internxt?
answer: Nobody knows your audience better than you! However, once you register for our affiliate partner program you’ll be provided a ton of tips and assets to choose from.

faq.question: How long does the provided cookie last?
answer: We follow the market standard of a 30-day policy.

faq.question: When will my application be reviewed?
answer: Your dedicated affiliate manager will get back to you in about 24 hours.

faq.question: More questions?
answer: If you have any additional questions, comments, or concerns please read our Terms and Conditions or message us at [affiliates@internxt.com](mailto:affiliates@internxt.com).

CtaSection.title: Get paid to protect the right to privacy
CtaSection.description: Join now and promote the world's most private open-source cloud storage service.
